game.name: Picnic In The Zone
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Picnic In The Zone tells a story about survival in the Zone. A vast, desolate place filled with dangerous enemies, deadly anomalies and strange mutated entities. Unveil your epic journey through the Zone as you hopelessly try to find your lost family.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Picnic In The Zone tells a story about survival in the Zone. A vast, desolate place filled with dangerous enemies, deadly anomalies and strange mutated entities. Unveil your epic journey through the Zone as you hopelessly try to find your lost family.
